Interface Values.Instructions<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>

Enclosing class:
Values
public static interface Values.Instructions<BusinessObjectType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,ProblemExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>

Used and required when the business object is not available in memory.

Nested Class Summary
static class Values.Instructions.Result
          States the result of an assessment.
 
Method Summary
 Values.Instructions.Result assess(Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> info)
          Is invoked every time the business object is tested in order to determine whether it is valid in its current state, or should be reloaded.

Method Detail

assess

Values.Instructions.Result assess(Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> info)
Is invoked every time the business object is tested in order to determine whether it is valid in its current state, or should be reloaded.

Parameters:
info - the proposed business object, its associated timestamp, and source
Returns:
the status which indicates whether the provided business object state has been validated

remember

void remember(Business.Source source,
              Values.Instructions.Result result)
Is invoked after each assessment and enables to store its result.

Parameters:
source - where the business object comes from
result - the result of the assessment

onNotFromLoaded

Values.Info<BusinessObjectType> onNotFromLoaded(Values.CachingEvent cachingEvent)
                                                throws ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,
                                                       ProblemExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception
Is invoked when the underlying business object will not be taken from the memory cache, or when the cached value has been rejected.

Parameters:
cachingEvent - the interface that will be used to notify the caller about the loading workflow ; may be null
Returns:
the wrapped business object that should be attempted to be requested from another place than the cache
Throws:
ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception

onUnaccessible

ProblemExceptionType onUnaccessible(java.lang.Exception causeException)
Will be invoked when the business object cannot be eventually retrieved.

Parameters:
causeException - the reason which states why the business object cannot be retrieved
Returns:
an exception to be thrown to the caller
